Rung for the Centenary of the Bath & Wells Diocesan Association by members of the local band.
Mainly by members of a Knutsford past and present band.
Rung to celebrate the forthcoming marriage of Roxy Dexter and Peter Sheppard.
1: Circled the tower x5 this year.
To celebrate Ian Hay Davison's 80th birthday (today).

title.details: Simultaneous quarters of Grandsire Doubles on the front and back five. No internal rounds on 10.
Simultaneous quarters on the front and back five. No internal rounds on all 10 bells.
